Description: Fashionably modern jumper makes pants elegant and contemporary. A sweetheart neckline and ankle length jumper is covered by a sheer chiffon overlay with a halter top that flows to the floor. There is a satin sash at the waist to accent the waistline and create the separates look. Perfect for an evening out with that special someone.
